name: Iasmite
description:
This game is still VERY early in development. I plan to update this game over the next couple of months with more content and polish (Such as actually finishing the first area!)

You are a advanced asteroid mining robot, sent to the recently discovered E-37 asteroid. It is believed to have rich deposits of Iasmite within the core, but perhaps this asteroid is home to more than meets the eye...

Controls, because I haven't put a tutorial in the game (yet).

Arrows: Move

A: Jump

S: Attack
